entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to freezing rain near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:39 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain and a thunderstorm this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and after midnight. Local rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 11:39 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
